<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Candle of Revealing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3412)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 306 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When lit, this black candle's eerie blue flame reveals the presence of invisible creatures. Within a 10-foot radius of the lit candle, creatures don't benefit from the [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=83) condition. Their bodies are outlined, not fully visible, so they're [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62). Once lit, the candle burns for 1 minute, after which the effect ends. If extinguished, it can't be relit.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Candle of Revealing
